apifyStorageId.title: Apify Storage ID
apifyStorageId.description: Id of dataset or key value store where the data are located.

recordKey.title: Record Key
recordKey.description: Only specify if Apify storage id points to a key value store! This is the record key under which the data are.

rawData.title: Raw Data
rawData.description: Raw JSON array you want to check.

functionalChecker.title: Functional Checker
functionalChecker.description: Function that returns an object with item fields as keys and values as predicates (functions that return true/false)

identificationFields.title: Identification Fields
identificationFields.description: You can specify which fields should display in the debug OUTPUT to identify bad items. By default it shows all fields which may make it unnecessary big.

noExtraFields.title: No extra fields
noExtraFields.description: If checked on, the actor will consider extra fields as bad fields. Uncheck if you don't mind them

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: How many items will be checked. Default is all

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: From which item the checking will start. Use with limit to check specific items.

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: You can change number of loaded and processed items in each batch. This is only needed if you have really huge items.

copyMode.title: copy mode (for debug only)
copyMode.description: Check if we can remove memory leak.
